subject: Re: [junit] need help configuring
msgSnippet: ... Please use Google to learn the difference between PATH and CLASSPATH. This is not a JUnit problem, but a Java problem. Good luck. -- J. B. (Joe)
messageBody:
waldo700 wrote:

> I'm probably missing something very subtle here. Can't find the exact
> guidance I need in the FAQ. (Or if it's there, I'm not seeing it.)
>
> Any assistance would be greatly appreciated.

Please use Google to learn the difference between PATH and CLASSPATH.
This is not a JUnit problem, but a Java problem.

Good luck.
--
J. B. (Joe) Rainsberger
Diaspar Software Services
http://www.diasparsoftware.com
2005 Gordon Pask Award Winner for contribution to Agile practice
Author, JUnit Recipes: Practical Methods for Programmer Testing
